Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Earthenware \Earth"en*ware`\, n. Vessels and other utensils, ornaments, or the like, made of baked clay. See {Crockery}, {Pottery}, {Stoneware}, and {Porcelain}. [1913 Webster]
earthenware n : ceramic ware made of porous clay fired at low heat
